record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2920
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--S. 2920 -- (Senate - April 24, 2008)

[Page: S3413]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I think--I do not think--I am almost certain that S. 2920 is at the desk and due for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2920) to reauthorize and improve the financing and entrepreneurial development programs of the Small Business Administration, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for its second reading but object to my own request.

record.chair: The bill will be read the second time on the next legislative day.
